mapper.sql: sal_data_id, personxc_id, salaryflow_id, user_id, sal_SSalary, sal_expression
mapper.insert: insert into tb_sal_data (sal_data_id, personxc_id, salaryflow_id, id, sal_SSalary, sal_expression, personxc_s1, personxc_s2, personxc_s3, personxc_s4, personxc_s5, personxc_s6, personxc_s7, personxc_s8, personxc_s9, personxc_s10, personxc_insurejs, personxc_ylinsure, personxc_dwyl, personxc_gryl, personxc_ylbx, personxc_dw_medical, personxc_grmedical, personxc_group, personxc_dwsy, personxc_sybx, personxc_dwshiye, personxc_grsy, personxc_gsbx, personxc_dwgs, personxc_housingfund, personxc_dwzf, personxc_grzf, personxc_expression) values (#{salDataId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{personxc.personxcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salaryflow.salaryflowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user.id}, #{salSsalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{salExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personxcS1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcS2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcS3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcS4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcS5,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcS6,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcS7,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcS8,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcS9,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcS10,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcInsurejs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcYlinsure,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcDwyl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcGryl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcYlbx,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcDwMedical,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcGrmedical,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcGroup,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcDwsy,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcSybx,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcDwshiye,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcGrsy,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcGsbx,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcDwgs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcHousingfund,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcDwzf,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcGrzf,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personxcExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_sal_data set salaryflow_id = #{salaryflow.salaryflowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id = #{user.id}, sal_SSalary = #{salSsalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sal_expression = #{salExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, personxc_s1 = #{personxcS1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_s2 = #{personxcS2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_s3 = #{personxcS3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_s4 = #{personxcS4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_s5 = #{personxcS5,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_s6 = #{personxcS6,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_s7 = #{personxcS7,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_s8 = #{personxcS8,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_s9 = #{personxcS9,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_s10 = #{personxcS10,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_insurejs = #{personxcInsurejs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_ylinsure = #{personxcYlinsure,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_dwyl = #{personxcDwyl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_gryl = #{personxcGryl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_ylbx = #{personxcYlbx,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_dw_medical = #{personxcDwMedical,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_grmedical = #{personxcGrmedical,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_group = #{personxcGroup,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_dwsy = #{personxcDwsy,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_sybx = #{personxcSybx,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_dwshiye = #{personxcDwshiye,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_grsy = #{personxcGrsy,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_gsbx = #{personxcGsbx,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_dwgs = #{personxcDwgs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_housingfund = #{personxcHousingfund,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_dwzf = #{personxcDwzf,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_grzf = #{personxcGrzf,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, personxc_expression = #{personxcExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sal_data_id = #{salDataId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sal_data_id from tb_sal_data where tb_sal_data.id=#{id} and tb_sal_data.salaryflow_id=#{pid}
select COUNT(*) from tb_sal_data where tb_sal_data.id=#{uid} and tb_sal_data.salaryflow_id=#{id}
select * from tb_sal_data s LEFT JOIN tb_admin a ON s.id=a.id where salaryflow_id=#{sid}
